ai_assessment.overall_assessment: Based on 3 questions with an average score of 1.6/10, the candidate needs substantial preparation before interviewing. Responses lacked depth, specific examples, and clear structure. Recommend intensive practice, technical review, and mock interviews before proceeding.
critical_gaps: Add specific examples or experiences to illustrate your points
Use a clearer structure (e.g., STAR method: Situation, Task, Action, Result)
Provide more detailed and comprehensive answers
specific_recommendations: Practice STAR method (Situation, Task, Action, Result) for behavioral questions
Prepare 3-5 detailed project examples with quantifiable results
Review technical fundamentals and practice explaining concepts clearly
